binding.label: ACFT SYS : %s
binding.script: var modes = ['','NORM','FUEL HYDR','ELEC','CTRL POS','ENG']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: ACFT SYS : %s
binding.script: var modes = ['','NORM','FUEL HYDR','ELEC','CTRL POS','ENG']; return modes[arg[0]];

binding.label: Select : %s
binding.script: var modes = ['SUPPLY','CKPT SEL','CKPT','CABIN','CABIN SEL','SUPPLY']; return modes[arg[0]];
